description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of function f(x) = 3x + 10.
comments: n, 3*n+10, 9*n+40, 27*n+130 and 81*n+400 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..1000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(3*n+10) and IsPrime(9*n+40) and IsPrime(27*n+130) and IsPrime(81*n+400)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
